text: David Lesley Schultz (June 6, 1959 – January 26, 1996) was an American Olympic and world champion freestyle wrestler, a seven-time World and Olympic Gold medalist. Dave and his brother Mark Schultz, also a wrestler, were known for both winning gold at the same Olympics (1984). He was born in Palo Alto, California. Schultz was murdered by John Eleuthère du Pont, a millionaire philanthropist who sponsored the private Foxcatcher wrestling team in Newtown Township, Pennsylvania at the age of 36. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Murders by firearm in the United States Category:American crime victims Category:American wrestlers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:People from Palo Alto, California
title: Dave Schultz (wrestler)
